forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight approaches here in Downtown San Francisco, the sky presents a canvas of deep blue, devoid of the usual fog blankets that often drape this iconic city. The evening air, wrapped in a gentle embrace of softness, hovers around a mild 54 degrees, with a subtle breeze stirring from the southwest—a perfect invitation for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or through the city's bustling streets. Friday promises a radiant day ahead, with sunshine illuminating the cityscape. A high near 67 beckons, though it will gracefully descend to about 65 as afternoon shadows lengthen; thus, opting for layers is prudent. A light jacket would serve well, easily discarded as the sun climbs.

The clarity of the day offers a rare view of the Golden Gate Bridge standing majestically against the horizon, reminding one of the city’s enchanting allure. The absence of the usual marine layer allows for a day filled with possibilities; from savoring a quiet afternoon at one of the local cafés, delving into a captivating book, to wandering through the vibrant art and culture of nearby neighborhoods. There’s a stillness in the air tonight, a perfect backdrop for simple pleasures. As the city continues to awaken, have a moment of reflection and enjoy the subtle rhythms of life.
